Welcome to mlneuro’s documentation!¶

Machine learning with a focus on neuroscience applications

Submodules¶

regression Estimators for predicting a continuous variable from features, allows probablistic prediction over the range of the value
classification Estimators for predicting categorical assignments from features (placeholder)
filtering Objects and functions for filtering noisy timestamped data and predictions at given times such as a sample rate
crossvalidation Cross-validation objects allowing automatic generation of stacked cross-validators, noisy data masking, and cross-validation for binned regression
preprocessing Functions for preprocessing both signal and stimulus data
common Mathematical and discretizing functions used by other modules
utils

Members¶
